description.value: The Australian Veteran Status value set includes values to support the representation of a person's veteran status. That is, whether a person is serving, or has served, in the Australian Defence Force. The values are those concepts defined in the Australian Veteran Status code system (https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/CodeSystem/australian-veteran-status-1).
